short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 为使用Postwoman UFO Web应用程序提供更好的体验，顺畅的在postwoman.com.cn和postdata.cn WEB应用下访问localhost应用内WEB API，请访问 (https://postwoman.com.cn)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Postwoman.com.cn, which provides a functionality similar to postman's app that allows us to use and debug web apis, is an extension that provides web sites with the ability to access web apis at localhost addresses
